response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible experience while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe in the immense value this product can bring to you and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 12000}
